message: Chris, do you have any plans (or would be open to the suggestion) to release the gist list prior to the release of DP5? I have created my own list (short, maybe 300 so far) but there are certain terms that are weirdly hard to get my head around. (Example: Cause. It's easy to do things like "Fighting for equal treatment" -- that's a cause -- but is "structural damage to a dam" a cause? (It certainly would cause a breach eventually.)) Having a master list to draw from, and use as a springboard, would be great!

"Structural damage to a dam" is not inherently a good gist for "Cause", though I think it might work if you rephrase it to something like "Causing structural damage to a dam," or "Structurally damaging a dam."  I think those would "read" better.
Sort of -- We have tentative plans to do some gist building during the beta period of the software.  We'd like to build a substantial database, which will take time and lots of participants.
Now you've opened yourself up to a variant of "when are you releasing DP5"... When are you going into beta?
No date yet, though we were talking about that today in our managers' meeting.  Trust me, you'll hear about it when we announce the beta cycle.
